# Module Core Creator

Scaffold complete Module_Core infrastructure for new WinUI 3 projects. Creates foundational services, helpers, models, global behaviors, and DI configuration from scratch.

## Instructions
See: `_bmad/module-agents/agents/module-core-creator.md`

## Model
gpt-4o

## Tools
create_file, read_file, list_dir, file_search, grep_search, semantic_search, replace_string_in_file, multi_replace_string_in_file, list_code_usages, get_errors
